name: aifinadvisor-api-libs
description: API libraries generator and publisher for FinApp

scripts.generate:all: npm run validate && npm run generate:backend && npm run generate:frontend
scripts.prepare:packages: npm run generate:all && npm run copy:packages
scripts.copy:packages: npm run copy:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:backend: rimraf packages/backend-api/src && cp -r generated/backend/src packages/backend-api/ && cp generated/backend/pom.xml packages/backend-api/
scripts.build:packages: npm run prepare:packages && npm run build:frontend-package
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.publish:all: npm run build:packages && npm run publish:frontend && npm run publish:backend

author: sergey-vsv
